thread.title: Ovila-bound
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Ovila-bound

author: Ovila-bound
title: Ovila-bound
text: We've been shopping the typical furniture giants looking for quality furniture without paying a small fortune. We were pleasantly surprised to find some of the same pieces we were considering at the "luxury" furniture stores for a fraction of the price. Arielle was amazing. She was knowledgeable and very attentive without being pushy and overbearing.
